testAllocations().details: View-only; checks balances against expected allocation percentages

testTotalSupply().details: Marked as view to avoid Solidity 2018 warning since no state is modified

setUp().notice: Deploys token and sets up initial distribution for all recipients

testAllocations().notice: Validates that each allocation address received its intended portion

testTotalSupply().notice: Ensures total supply equals 1 billion BVP with 18 decimals

testTransferWorks().notice: Tests basic ERC-20 token transfer from publicSale to a user
